title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for having the toaster and coffeemaker in parallel

One point is earned for including the fuse in series with the power supply

One point is earned for a complete circuit with all elements labeled and no extra devices
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

One point is earned for having the toaster and coffeemaker in parallel

One point is earned for including the fuse in series with the power supply

One point is earned for a complete circuit with all elements labeled and no extra devices

The student earns one of the following points:

One point is earned for having the toaster and coffeemaker in parallel

One point is earned for including the fuse in series with the power supply

One point is earned for a complete circuit with all elements labeled and no extra devices

The student earns two of the following points:

One point is earned for having the toaster and coffeemaker in parallel

One point is earned for including the fuse in series with the power supply

One point is earned for a complete circuit with all elements labeled and no extra devices

The student earns all of the following points:

One point is earned for having the toaster and coffeemaker in parallel

One point is earned for including the fuse in series with the power supply

One point is earned for a complete circuit with all elements labeled and no extra devices

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for a correct expression showing the relationship between power and current

One point is earned for calculating the current through each appliance (OR full credit could also be earned for calculating the total power)

One point is earned for the correct answer

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for a correct expression relating resistance and power, voltage or current (credit was not awarded for showing the same expression used in (b))

One point is earned for calculating the resistance of the coffeemaker

One point is earned for calculating the resistance of the toaster

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for calculating either: the maximum power that can be drawn by the circuit, OR the maximum current for the hair dryer such that the fuse is not blown, OR the maximum resistance for the hair dryer such that the fuse is not blown

One point is earned for calculating the maximum power of the hair dryer for using one of the quantities above
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

One point is earned for calculating either: the maximum power that can be drawn by the circuit, OR the maximum current for the hair dryer such that the fuse is not blown, OR the maximum resistance for the hair dryer such that the fuse is not blown

One point is earned for calculating the maximum power of the hair dryer for using one of the quantities above

One point is earned for calculating the maximum power of the hair dryer for using one of the quantities above

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for indicating Yes (the two original appliances can be operated in series without blowing the fuse)

One point is earned for indicating that the equivalent resistance of the series circuit is greater than the equivalent resistance of the parallel circuit

One point is earned for indicating that the current is less than 20 A with correct reasoning
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

One point is earned for indicating Yes (the two original appliances can be operated in series without blowing the fuse)

One point is earned for indicating that the equivalent resistance of the series circuit is greater than the equivalent resistance of the parallel circuit

One point is earned for indicating that the current is less than 20 A with correct reasoning

title: Units
stimulusHtml: One point is earned for correct units on all numerical answers, parts (b), (c), (d)
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

One point is earned for correct units on all numerical answers, parts (b), (c), (d)

The student earns all of the following points:
